name: django-docker
description: run  docker compose exec web  python manage.py  makemigrations run  docker compose exec web  python manage.py  migrate      create and empty migration to preload data     docker compose exec web python manage.py makemigrations --empty notes --name load_initial_data Edit notes/migrations/0002_load_initial_data.py for static/global/data/data.py this file contains data to feed your app (this step is optional but recomended)
